Package it.unimore.iot.health.api.datamanager.utils

Class UtilityClass

java.lang.Object
it.unimore.iot.health.api.datamanager.utils.UtilityClass
public final class UtilityClass extends Object
UtilityClass is a helper class with only static methods that are useful in certain part of the codebase. This kind of class does not need to be instantiated to get access to its methods.
Author:
Christopher Zanoli, Undergraduate student - 270765@studenti.unimore.it

  • Method Details

    • modifySenMLPack

      public static SenMLPack modifySenMLPack(SenMLPack senMLPack)
      This method allows taking as input the SenMLPack containing the telemetry data and remap it on a new senMLPack with a different management of base fields and regular fields. For example, this method maps in the bn (base name) the name field of the SenMLRecord contained inside the SenMLPack, as the device ID is contained in a special field of the HealthCheckDescriptor.
      Parameters:
      senMLPack - it is the ArrayList of SenMLRecord related to telemetry data
      Returns:
      a new mapped SenMLPack with respect to its fields
      Since:
      1.0

    • copyDifferences

      public static PatientDescriptor copyDifferences(PatientDescriptor destination, PatientDescriptor source) throws IllegalAccessException, NoSuchFieldException
      This method is responsible for making the copy of the non-null values of the attributes present inside the source PatientDescriptor (which contains all the null attributes except those inserted by the client during the patient PUT request) on a destination PatientDescriptor.

      Without this algorithm any fields not specified in the PUT phase would be set to null.

      Parameters:
      destination - it represents the PatientDescriptor object on which to map the non-null values of the attributes coming from the update request by the client.
      source - it represents the PatientDescriptor object from which to map the non-null values of its attributes to destination.
      Returns:
      the destination PatientDescriptor updated
      Throws:
      IllegalAccessException
      NoSuchFieldException

    • copyDifferences

      public static HealthCheckDescriptor copyDifferences(HealthCheckDescriptor destination, HealthCheckDescriptor source) throws IllegalAccessException, NoSuchFieldException
      This method is responsible for making the copy of the non-null values of the attributes present inside the source HealthCheckDescriptor (which contains all the null attributes except those inserted by the client during the healthcheck PUT request) on a destination HealthCheckDescriptor.

      Without this algorithm any fields not specified in the PUT phase would be set to null.

      Parameters:
      destination - it represents the HealthCheckDescriptor object on which to map the non-null values of the attributes coming from the update request by the client.
      source - it represents the HealthCheckDescriptor object from which to map the non-null values of its attributes to destination.
      Returns:
      the destination HealthCheckDescriptor updated
      Throws:
      IllegalAccessException
      NoSuchFieldException
